A man is trapped in a room. The room has only two
possible exits: two doors. Through the first door there
is a room constructed from magnifying glass. The
blazing hot sun instantly fries anything or anyone that
enters. Through the second door there is a fire-
breathing dragon. How does the man escape?
Two men are playing chess. They play five games. Each
man wins three games. How is that possible?

C: She was looking for him too.
